data.tweet: Joao Cancelo carried the ball into the opponent's box four times (more than any other player on the pitch) and carried the ball a total of 269 yards towards the opponent's goal (farther than any other player on the pitch)
Cancelo has carried the ball a total of 1,764 yards towards the opponent's goal this season - farther than any other player in the Premier League.
Cancelo successfully dribbled past an opponent on three occasions (more than any other player on the pitch).
Joao Cancelo and Arsenal's Martinelli have both completed 20 successful dribbles this season - the joint-most of any player in the league.
